com.alicecallsbob.fcsdk.android.uc

Interface UC

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ListenerTarget<UCListener>

    public interface UC
extends ListenerTarget<UCListener>
    The UC acts as the entry point to the SDK and provides the client application with a single object exposing all of the other functions through its properties (voice/video, presence/IM and AED). An instance of this class should be created with the UCFactory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AED getAED()
      Returns the object for AED interaction.
      Phone getPhone()
      Returns the object for voice/video interaction.

      Sets the HostnameVerifier used to validate the connection to the server.

      Informs the SDK that the network is reachable or not.
      void setSupportsRenegotiation(boolean supportsRenegotiation)

      Set the TrustManager used to validate the connection to the server.
      void setUseCookies(boolean use)
      Sets if we should send cookies when establishing a connection to the server.
      void startSession()
      Connects to the session indicated by the session key provided in the UCFactory.createUc(android.content.Context, String, UCListener) or UCFactory.createUc(android.content.Context, String, java.util.List, UCListener) methods.
      void stopSession()
      Disconnects from the session indicated by the session key provided in the UCFactory.createUc(android.content.Context, String, UCListener) or UCFactory.createUc(android.content.Context, String, java.util.List, UCListener) methods.

      • setNetworkReachable

        void setNetworkReachable(boolean reachable)
        Informs the SDK that the network is reachable or not.
        Parameters:
        reachable - Whether the network is reachable.

      • setTrustManager

        void setTrustManager(javax.net.ssl.TrustManager trustManager)
        Set the TrustManager used to validate the connection to the server.
        Parameters:
        trustManager - a custom TrustManager instance, or null to use the default TrustManager.

      • setHostnameVerifier

        void setHostnameVerifier(javax.net.ssl.HostnameVerifier hostnameVerifier)
        Sets the HostnameVerifier used to validate the connection to the server.

      • setUseCookies

        void setUseCookies(boolean use)
        Sets if we should send cookies when establishing a connection to the server. Requires that a default CookieHandler has been set in the application to capture cookies from explicit HttpConnections to the server, such as from a Login event.
        Parameters:
        use - True if cookies should be sent to the server, False if none are needed. Default is False

      • setSupportsRenegotiation

        void setSupportsRenegotiation(boolean supportsRenegotiation)
